params._fundsShare: result of the game given as a distribution of the funds previously locked

params._descartes: Descartes instance used for triggering verified computations
Descartes instance used for triggering verified computations
params._logger: Logger instance used for storing data in the event history
params._turnChunkLog2Size: turn data log2size considering 64-bit words (i.e., how many 64-bit words are there in a chunk of turn data)

params._fundsShare: result of the game given as a distribution of the funds previously locked

returns._isTimeout: true if a timeout was indeed verified, false otherwise

returns._isConsensus: boolean indicating whether all players have agreed with the claim

params._logger: Logger instance used for storing data in the event history
params._nextPlayer: address of a player responsible for next turn (can be empty, in which case no player will be held accountable for a timeout)
params._playerStake: amount of tokens at stake after the turn
params._turnChunkLog2Size: turn data log2size considering 64-bit words (i.e., how many 64-bit words are there in a chunk of turn data)
params._turnIndex: a sequential number for the turn, which must be equal to the last submitted turn's index + 1

applyResult(GameContext storage,uint256,.notice: Applies the results of a game, transferring locked funds according to the provided distribution

applyVerificationResult(GameContext stor.notice: Applies the result of a game verified by Descartes, transferring funds according to the Descartes computation output

challengeGame(GameContext storage,uint25.notice: Challenges game state, triggering a verification by a Descartes computation

claimResult(GameContext storage,uint256,.notice: Claims game has ended with the provided result (share of locked funds)

claimTimeout(GameContext storage,uint256.notice: Claims game has ended due to a timeout.

submitTurn(GameContext storage,uint256,u.notice: Submits a new turn for a given game
